story.hero_title: A Tale from the Heart of Baghdad
story.hero_subtitle: From Baghdad to Bahrain, a journey where we preserve traditions and add modern touches.
story.founder_bio_1: Eng. Asaad Al-Jubouri carries a deep passion for detail, the same passion that accompanied him from the world of engineering to the world of taste. For him, food was not a commercial project, but a sincere means of conveying the culture and generosity of Baghdad to Bahrain.
story.founder_bio_2: With an engineering mindset that believes quality is built and not accidental, he designed "Kahramana Baghdad" to be more than a restaurant: a space where Iraqi authenticity meets modern taste and upscale Bahraini hospitality.
story.founder_bio_3: Today, Al-Jubouri stands behind every detail presented to the guest, from selecting ingredients to the method of presentation, to ensure that every visit is a true reflection of his passion, vision, and respect for his guests' taste.
story.founder_quote: "I didn't just build a restaurant, I brought the flavor of Baghdad to Bahrain."
story.values_subtitle: The foundations upon which we built this monument
story.symbolism_text: In the Baghdadi memory, "Kahramana" was not just a told tale, but a symbol of smartness, generosity, and victory through wisdom. From this deep meaning, the idea of "Kahramana Baghdad" was born—a restaurant that evokes the authentic spirit of Baghdad and presents it in a modern style that suits today's taste.
story.philosophy_text: At "Kahramana Baghdad", we create a complete experience that begins with the first threads of dawn by serving the finest Iraqi breakfast including bagila bil dihin, kahi and gaimar, all the way to lunch feasts of authentic Iraqi meat tashreeb and Baghdadi masgouf. We take the secrets of the inherited kitchen and carefully blend them with the elegance of Bahraini hospitality to create a flavor that combines the authenticity of the past and the sophistication of the present.
story.journey_text: Every dish served is an invitation to a sensory journey that starts from the old alleys of Baghdad and crosses time to reach your table in Bahrain. Here, meals are not just served, but a tale of generosity, passion, and uniqueness that makes our guests feel at home.
story.value_authenticity_text: We preserve authentic Iraqi recipes without compromise.
story.value_quality_text: The finest fresh, local, and imported ingredients.
story.value_hospitality_text: We welcome you as our family, with the spirit of warm Iraqi hospitality.
story.value_innovation_text: We blend heritage with modern touches that suit your refined taste.

branches.talk_body: At Kahramana Baghdad, we strive to make every visit an unforgettable memory. Our team is dedicated to ensuring your comfort and attending to the finest details of your experience. Do not hesitate to contact us for any inquiries or to arrange your private reservations, as your satisfaction is our primary goal.

items.q: Where are your branches located in Bahrain?
items.a: We currently have two premium locations: Riffa (Hajiyat) and Muharraq (Galali).
Riffa Branch: Daily from 7:00 AM to 1:00 AM. | Galali Branch: Daily from 12:00 PM to 1:00 AM.

items.a: No, there is no minimum order requirement. Delivery fees vary by area.
